name: Basil Cat: Hidden Adventure
description:
The player controls the cat Basil, who collects items and tries not to get caught by a zombie that continuously follows the cat.

The game, in which you need to search for items in a limited period of time, while there are various bonuses that can help you.

When you find items, the player earns money, which can later be spent on the purchase of useful items and equipment that will allow you to pass new levels.

https://vk.com/kytinstudio
